caption.p: The barrier should remain in place until the end of the procedure. Aerosols can be seen in the plastic. The oral protector with the plastic in place is removed, and a wrapping maneuver is performed from the front to the back to avoid peripheral contamination. Once a sphere is formed with the plastic, it is covered with the gloves used for the enveloping maneuver and they are discarded. Double gloving is required.
